Server.Name: Ravenhearst SDX Whitelist Player Files For The Server
Server.Description: Private Server Ravenhearst Player files for our server members. If you would like to play with us please visit our website and fill out an application. For single player version check out our link below.

Server.Name: Ravenhearst SDX Single Player Edition
Server.Description: Single Player Version of Ravenhearst with the normal 7 Days Blood Moon spawn. This mod would not have been possible without the true innovators of 7 Days like Valmar, dwallorde, xyth, Clockwork Orange and coutless others who have both taught me and influenced me throughout my modding. Some of the icons and ideas have been tweaked from various other mods. All credit goes to the respective modders.

Server.Name: Ravenhearst SDX SP 21 Day Horde Edition
Server.Description: Single Player Version of Ravenhearst with Blood Moon spawning every 21 days. This mod would not have been possible without the true innovators of 7 Days like Valmar, dwallorde, xyth, Clockwork Orange and coutless others who have both taught me and influenced me throughout my modding. Some of the icons and ideas have been tweaked from various other mods. All credit goes to the respective modders.

Server.Name: Ravenhearst SDX Streamer Edition
Server.Description: Streamer Friendly Version of Ravenhearst 7 Days Blood Moon spawn and removed nude zombies.
